techmeme.title: A look at the impact of ChatGPT use on energy consumption, as analysis suggests AI usage is still a rounding error on a person's total electricity footprint (Hannah Ritchie/Sustainability)
DoorDash's planned takeover of Deliveroo has renewed questions about the UK's ability to attract and retain large tech listings in the face of NY's dominance (Financial Times)
Jeff Bezos and Michael Dell's family offices have committed $1B in total to Coatue's new investment fund targeting high-growth public and private tech companies (Angel Au-Yeung/Wall Street Journal)
The CFPB says it will stop enforcing a Biden-era rule treating BNPL firms like credit card lenders; Affirm and other BNPL firms had opposed the rule (MacKenzie Sigalos/CNBC)
New Hampshire becomes the first US state to pass a "Strategic Bitcoin Reserve" bill, permitting public fund investment in BTC, either directly or through an ETF (Daniel Kuhn/The Block)
